column3:
ACK, including for 0.10.

Maybe we also want to enable these tests for all PRs? (see qa/pull-tester/rpc-tests.sh)?

"all these tests" might run into Travis timeout issues -- but any RPC test that takes less than... oh... two minutes to run should probably be in rpc-tests.sh.

It would be spiffy if longer-running tests were run against HEAD once a day or something...
